content: a unique asymmetrical crochet wrap featuring hand-dyed sock weight yarn the mood swings wrap is a beginner-friendly and easy to follow design that is a joy to crochet and will be the perfect accessory to transition you into spring this wrap is a great introduction to using sock-weight yarn for the first time or for making your first asymmetrical wrap this design features basic stitches such as half_double_crochet and double_crochet and is worked in turned row that increase by one stitch on the same side the wrap uses repeating sections and indicated color changes i hope your asymmetrical crochet wrap reflects your journey and represents where you are on your mental health path and that you truly call it your own skill level - advanced beginner this pattern is written in standard us terms the featured wrap is made with #1/fingering weight 100% superwash merino yarn and uses a us size 7/4 5 mm crochet hook * i used hand-dyed yarn from sewrella yarn in her classic sock base - 100% superwash merino yarn 400 yards/100g each for a total of 1 200 yards for this project * from her autumn in new york collection i used two hanks in the city that never sleeps color a and one hank in speakeasy color b for a total of three hanks 1 200 yards of sock-weight yarn guage 17 double_crochet x 11 row - 4inches finished wrap approximately 38 wide and 58 long down the side that does not increase
